1.question: Mrs. Sheridan has 11 cats. How many more cats does Mrs. Sheridan need to have 43 cats?

3.question: Mrs. Wong had 30 Valentines. She gave 8 Valentines to her children. How many does she have left?

2.question: Mrs. Sheridan has 11 cats. Mrs. Garrett has 24 cats. How many more cats does Mrs. Garrett have than Mrs. Sheridan?

5.question: Mrs. Snyder made 86 heart cookies. She made 36 red cookies and the rest are pink. How many pink cookies did she make?

4.question: Mrs. Franklin had 58 Valentines. Mrs. Franklin gave some to her students. Now she has 16. How many Valentines did Mrs. Franklin give to her students?
